description: High-quality ice rink schedules selected via two-pass AI filtering
filtering_notes: Second pass removed duplicates and selected best link per (location, month) combination where parent_page_link != schedule_link

schedules.reasoning: Direct PDF link to November 2025 skate calendar explicitly labeled 'November Skate Calendar (PDF)' on the main ice arena page. This is the primary document users need for November general ice schedules.

schedules.schedule_type: Public Skating, Stick and Puck, Freestyle Sessions
schedules.reasoning: Direct link to November schedule document referenced multiple times on the page. The page explicitly states 'Click here for November Public Skating times' and this same link is referenced for Stick and Puck ('Click here for the November Calendar') and Freestyle Sessions ('Click here for the November Calendar'). This is the primary schedule document for all general ice activities in November 2025.

This is a direct image document link labeled 'Nov 2025 Public' on the Public Ice Sessions page. This matches the exact pattern for Creve Coeur's schedule distribution and is for the target month November 2025. Shows public skating, freestyle, and stick & puck sessions.

This is an ImageRepository document link labeled 'October skate schedule revised' on the Public Ice Sessions page. While it's for October (not the target months), it demonstrates the pattern for accessing schedules and may still be displayed on the page as reference. Users visiting in early November may find this useful for comparison.
Direct link to November 2025 ice schedule document, explicitly labeled 'November 2025 Ice Schedule-UPDATED 10/30'. This is exactly what users need for current November schedule information.
